alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Murray; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gilmer, northeastern Murray, northeastern Whitfield and northwestern Fannin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Crandall, or 8 miles north of Chatsworth, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Chatsworth, Blue Ridge, Eton, Crandall, Sumac, Jones Mill, Higdon, Gregory, Cohutta Wilderness, Epworth, Conasauga Lake, Beaverdale, Mineral Bluff, Cisco, Cherry Log and Colwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
